桸字的基本解释

桸
xī
古书上说的一种树，其汁可以食用。
勺子。

桸字的汉语字典释义

[①]［xī］
［《廣韻》許羈切，平支，曉。］
亦作“獻3”。
勺子。

桸字的康熙字典解释

【辰集中】【木字部】　桸； 康熙笔画：11； 页码：页527第13
【唐韻】許羈切【集韻】【韻會】虛宜切，?音犧。【說文】朽也。【類篇】勺也。通作?。或作獻。【前漢·王莽傳】建華蓋，立斗獻。師古音犧。斗魁及杓末如勺之形。　又【廣韻】香衣切，音希。木名，汁可食。

桸字的源字形

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体香港明体韩国明朝体
桸字的起名意思

古书上说的一种树。

桸
Basic explanation of words
桸
xī
The juice of a tree mentioned in ancient books is edible.
Spoon.
桸
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［xī］
["Guangyun" Xu Jiqie, Pingzhi, Xiao. ]
Also known as "Xian 3".
Spoon.
桸
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Chen Ji] [Wood Character Department] 　桸; Kangxi Strokes: 11; Page Number: Page 527 13
[Tang Yun] Xu Jiqie [Jiyun] [Yunhui] It's appropriate to cut, and sacrifice. [Said the text] Worry also. 【Classes】Spoon too. Pass for?. Or make a contribution. [Previous Han·Wang Mang Biography] Jianhua Gai, stand up fighting. Teacher Gu Yin sacrifice. The Dou Kui and the scoop are shaped like a spoon.　[Guangyun] Xiangyi cut, Yinxi. Wooden name, edible juice.
